name: Magical Miracle Mira -Chapter Zero
description:
The first Magical Miracle Mira demo - play through the whole Chapter Zero of Mira's story, and get a tiny taste of the full game experience!

Update: So, this was an April Fool's 2017 prank.

Notice the version number "1.04.17" - hidden in plain sight.

The main part of the joke, however, was the title. "Chapter Zero".
The story starts at chapter one, folks! There is no chapter zero! =P
The game exits when you choose 'start' from the menu; since there is no chapter zero, it was in fact technically true when I said you could play through the whole chapter zero. ;P

Though maybe we'll do a prologue demo. For real. =3
